string.text:
The Duplet is a simple, crude firearm made from reinforced scrap metal and wood. The accuracy is low due to the crude finish of the barrel, but it's not an issue since the Duplet is made for close quarters, one of the first kind of firearms to ever be available in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES / ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Poor construction quality greatly reduces accuracy
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Modified trigger mechanism to fire two rounds simultaneously
A sturdier barrel built to endure higher pressures, enhancing reliability and allowing the use of Slug shell ammunition for greater range and stopping power.
A finely finished barrel with an enhanced bore surface, significantly improving accuracy and allowing the use of Dart shell ammunition for tighter shot grouping and extended effective range.

A heavily reinforced barrel with a modified chamber, engineered exclusively for Bull shell ammunition. This upgrade maximizes power but significantly reduces durability due to the extreme pressure of Bull shells, while rendering the weapon incompatible with all other shell types.
